name: test_e2e_with_logs[362_CMD_PROC_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_PROC_002` |
| **Name** | Nohup background execution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | process_spawning |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `nohup /tmp/backdoor.sh &`
- **Encoded**: `nohup%20%2Ftmp%2Fbackdoor.sh%20%26`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~46000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:30.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_PROC_002-1770842250556-a8079 pattern_id=CMD_PROC_002 uri=/?q=nohup%20%2Ftmp%2Fbackdoor.sh%20%26 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
